item.title: Exploring More Complex Patterns with Artificial Neural Networks
item.author: swissbib-ub@unibas.ch (project swissbib)
item.description: Besides the availability of data, an additional reason why Machine Learning has become a popular topic has to do with publicly available code libraries that simplify the implementation of machines. One such library is TensorFlow, an open-source platform written by Google Brain. TensorFlow can be used for implementing Neural Networks. Since the end of 2019 a library called keras has been integrated on top of TensorFlow. This library makes the code implementation of Neural Networks even easier.
